about_the_game:
GROUNDBREAKING FANTASY TURN BASED RPG

Hero Quest - God of Chaos is a brand-new game from Future Intellect. The most immersive strategic RPG fantasy styled chess combat is combined with a vast world to explore.

Battle with beasts, demons, trolls, ogres, undead and more!
Collect legendary treasure to gain super powers!

Explore the vast realms of Aqora and be the first to witness the unseen magical lands. Use your allies and create the ultimate team of heroes to defeat the denizens of Aqora! Invite your friends and experience the online turn based role playing game where an all powerful God of Chaos threatens to destroy the world. Join forces with other players on epic quests and raids to attempt to save Aqora from the God of Chaos.

Fans of strategy and online RPG games and new players alike will embark on new adventures across a vast series of realms.

SLAY YOUR WAY TO GLORY

Customize your characters and find magical items to grow their power! Gain the ability to cast a wide array of magical spells including elements like frost, fire, storm, holy, and even gain the ability to become an ax wielding barbarian.
Utilize elements of frost, fire, poison, wind, holy, shadow, and force to empower your heroes and unlock their true strength.
- Gain new items with each successful encounter and clash to become the most powerful player in the arena of war.
- Gear up with all-new set items and legendary weapons.
- Level up your characters and gain access to new skills through professional skill trainers.

STRATEGIC, INTELLIGENT, IMMERSIVE

- Trap enemies with your heroes and slay your foes.
- Deliver CRITICAL STRIKES at the perfect moment to achieve victory.
- Defeat powerful bosses with counter attacks and crowd controls.
- Cross-platform and cross save - Experience role playing games online with your PC or Mobile

EXPLORE A MAGICAL VAST WORLD

From the fantasy surroundings of Aqora to the grand city of East Port and the shadows of Grimire - Players have a vast world in front of them to explore.
- Your journey will take you through changing landscapes and ever evolving challenges.
- Experience a rich mystery/fantasy story packed with quests, bosses, and challenges.
- Hero Quest - God of Chaos has something for everyone whether you enjoy fighting through endless dungeons or spending your time uncovering every corner of the world, or crafting legendary weapons by becoming a master blacksmith.

A MULTIPLAYER EXPERIENCE

Players can invite real world friends by email and have opportunities to meet and experience combat with their fellow adventurers in the world of Aqora. Whether it's jumping into the arena of battle, embarking on a raid through the shadows of a dungeon, or upgrading gear - Hero Quest God of Chaos is here to support a rich online strategy based experience.

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 256mb or ATI Radeon HD 5670 256mb or Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Internet is required

short_description: Future Intellect's latest offering, Hero Quest, combines immersive strategic RPG gameplay with fantasy chess combat and a vast world to explore. Battle a variety of foes including beasts, demons, trolls, and undead, and collect legendary treasures. Invite friends for online turn-based RPG gameplay.
